seasons.title: The World's War: Forgotten Soldiers of the Empire

episodes.synopsis: While the British, French, Russian and American soldiers' stories are well recounted, World War I was fought by many less-heralded countries as well.
episodes.title: Martial Races

episodes.synopsis: David Olusoga shows how World War I extended far beyond Europe and the western front, affecting the lives of millions in India, Africa and Asia.
episodes.title: Foreign Legions

video.title: The World's War: Forgotten Soldiers of the Empire
video.synopsis: Historian David Olusoga shares the story of the millions of Indian, African and Asian troops who fought in the First World War.
